Classes in org.joone.edit used by org.joone.edit
AbstractChartSynapse
          Abstract class implemented by all the classes that want to plot some kind of chart using the values contained into the patterns passed as parameter of the fwdPut methods.
ChartingHandle
          This class acts as a container of all the characteristics of a serie plotted by a charting component (i.e. a component implementing the ChartInterface interface).
ChartInterface
          This interface declares the methods needed to implement a multi-series charting component.

          Graphic representation of a generic figure in the net
